accessrestrict.p: Photographic copies of each page are also available for researcher use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Preferred citation: [Identification of item], George Washington Account Books, WLU Coll. 0138, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA.
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections staff to verify the appropriate format.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mary Custis Lee, 1907. Previously part of Custis papers in possession of Lee family.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: George Washington served as the first president of the United States from April 30, 1789 â€“ March 4, 1797.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Leaves from folio ledger (35 leaves) containing copies of inventories and proposed division of the Daniel Parke Custis estate submitted to the General Court, October 1759, and guardianship accounts for Martha Parke and John Parke Custis in George Washington's hand, 1761-1773. Includes five draft inserted leaves and estate accounts for Augustine Washington in hand of Thomas Jett, 1766-1771 (6 leaves).
